name: Magic Forest Riches Slot Game
description:
Magic Forest Riches is a free-to-play 2D video slot game with 10 winning lines, wild symbols, and a free spins bonus feature. You can play this slot machine for fun – start with 500 virtual coins and spin the reels.

Gameplay design and programming by me, Suvi Hämäläinen. Created with Unity and C# programming language.

All the graphics are made by Elena Cherniavskaia. Link to Elena's portfolio: https://lenach.artstation.com/

The game can be played in a browser (use Google Chrome for the best experience).
